title: For
content:
Exemplo 1:
```
sequencia = [1, 2, 3]
for valor in sequencia
  console.log "Valor: #{valor}"
```
Exemplo 2:
```
sequencia = [1, 2, 3]
for index, valor of sequencia
  console.log "Índice: #{index}, Valor: #{valor}"
```
Exemplo 3:
```
sequencia = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
for index in [0...sequencia.length]
  valor = sequencia[index]
  console.log "Índice: #{index}, Valor: #{valor}"
```
